message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me is no more than $1,200,000

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could meet you halfway between our offers at $1,000,000. This reflects the product's significant worth while still providing you with substantial value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its value to me
